Description: Hieratic papyrus with a Late Egyptian Miscellany, recto cols 6-8: 6.1-10 'Praise of the Delta Residence'; 6.10-7.9 'Report on a mission'; 7.9-8.7 'Instructions for boat repair'; 8.7-9.4 'The pupil will build his teacher a castle'. Late Egyptian Miscellanies
Curator's comments: Published Gardiner, Late Egyptian Miscellanies; Caminos, Late Egyptian Miscellanies. Vernus, Revue d'Egyptologie 37, p. 144-145 [11, 4].
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380655) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380655)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bleached, loss, insect attack Black ink Backed: brown paper Displayed in Room 63 until 1997 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: C
